column4: I created a second USER account for my gf and gave her admin but so much stuff fails to load it just doesn't work.
wifi struggles to load and asks for already given wpa key and then hangs on hitting ENTER
try creating a 3rd user and compare
how are you creating the user for her ?
she didn't have Admin at first so I figured she needed it to set up certain programs and it seemed to help but now it just freezes on something
try creating a 3rd user to compare
doesn't really matter, but try to remain consistant with your test
do i need to restart X or anything?
what is the quickest way to log into the new account?
I'm giving correct information, could you explain how that's a problem
